Value:

register long double __cosr;                                                  \
  register long double __sinr;                                                \
  __asm __volatile__                                                          \
    ("fsincos\n\t"                                                            \
     "fnstsw    %%ax\n\t"                                                     \
     "testl     $0x400, %%eax\n\t"                                            \
     "jz        1f\n\t"                                                       \
     "fldpi\n\t"                                                              \
     "fadd      %%st(0)\n\t"                                                  \
     "fxch      %%st(1)\n\t"                                                  \
     "2: fprem1\n\t"                                                          \
     "fnstsw    %%ax\n\t"                                                     \
     "testl     $0x400, %%eax\n\t"                                            \
     "jnz       2b\n\t"                                                       \
     "fstp      %%st(1)\n\t"                                                  \
     "fsincos\n\t"                                                            \
     "1:"                                                                     \
     : "=t" (__cosr), "=u" (__sinr) : "0" (__x));                             \
  *__sinx = __sinr;                                                           \
  *__cosx = __cosr
